vtdigger.org/2015/04/state-unemployment-.snippet: The state unemployment rate dropped by one-tenth of a percentage point in March, according to seasonally adjusted figures from the Vermont Department of Labor. The revised jobless rate for March was 3.8 percent, compared to 3.9 percent in February.
